title: That‘s the Way It’s Gotta Be
description: Nick started dating Nicki for an article. He sets out to prove a point, but discovers what he’s been looking for right in front of him.
quote: And that’s how I almost accidentally married my best friend’s fiancé.
altHero: Nicki and Nick look at each other in front of a fountain
alt1: Nick and Nicki at dinner and her arm is on fire
alt3: Nick stands next to a drunk man sitting on a park bench
